title: Interpretation of a dream about a gecko in a dream portends evil

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansThe interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream refers to evil, geckos or geckos from the reptile family that feed on insects because they transmit many infections to humans. Killing it takes a lot of time, and our Master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, recommended the importance of killing the entrails, and the interpretation of dreams varies according to your social status and what happens to you, and we tried that. Collect a large number of symbols as follows. Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream: The muzzle is the genie or devil in the dream because it exposes humans to evil and some species are poisonous. It indicates the presence of a criminal or murderer near you. Snakes in a dream may indicate the presence of a married person who is “married” because Adultery. The leper symbolizes an infidel who fights and attacks Muslims and has enmity in his heart towards the Islamic religion. A dream about a leper may indicate the fire of strife that will ignite soon. It means someone who has bad morals, is not responsible for them, and is unbalanced in his actions. Interpretation of a dream for a married woman: seeing a bite is undoubtedly a dream Scary, and if a married woman sees a bite, this is an indication of the problems she faces in life with her husband, and this may indicate that she will face financial difficulties, but if she sees that the bite is fatal in her dream, this indicates the end of her financial problems, and perhaps the repayment of a debt or a relative, as well as good news that Her problems with her husband are over. Interpretation of dreams of hunters chasing me If you see a gecko chasing you and you are afraid that you will not be able to resist, this is a bad warning that there are shameful actions that must be stopped or that someone is conspiring against you. And he wants something bad for you, while if you can fight it and make it disappear, it means that your problems will end with God’s will. In absolute terms, commentators believe that killing the stomach means the end of the harm you have been exposed to, but if you see it exploding into your food, then you will suffer from illness, while the stomach blows on your money in a dream. That you are losing your money and becoming poor, you should check your financial accounts, and if you are planning to do business with someone, you should think carefully about your plans.To see a dream about pregnant women’s bellies, to dream of chasing a pregnant woman’s weight is good; Because it indicates that the pregnancy is not good and has problems, or that someone is pursuing her and wants to terminate this pregnancy. Of your thoughts. Interpretation of a single woman’s dream: It indicates hatred and gossip, meaning that there is someone who hates you and is jealous of you. If a leper is chasing you in your dream, then there is a terrible person chasing you. If you succeed in killing the leper, this means the end of the crises you are going through and the elimination of your enemies. Shamloul Your comments are welcomed, leave your dream in a message at the end of this article, and we will get back to you soon.

title: Interpretation of a dream about olives according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Olives are considered one of the plants mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, and seeing olives in a dream has many connotations and interpretations for interpretation scholars, so we will learn together in detail the connotations of seeing them in a dream. Dreaming of olives in a dream about Nabulsi. Nabulsi will interpret olives in a dream as money, and seeing olives in a dream is a man. Blessed and righteous, or a chaste woman, or an old son. Whoever sees olives in yellow, this indicates that he is in religion. As for the age of olives in a dream, it symbolizes the achievement of goodness and blessings, and seeing olives in a dream indicates beating slaves to beat them. Until it drops its load. It is said that seeing olives can be worrying, but olives are money and possessions, so whoever eats them will gain luck and livelihood. Olive fruit indicates ease of nutrition. Whoever dreams of cleaning or trampling olives, this indicates exhaustion and hardship. Whoever is sick and sees olives in his dream appears. Its strength. Olive leaves and fruits also symbolize stability of work, and seeing olives in a dream also shows guiding the sinner, repairing a broken heart and money for the poor. Olive oil in a dream Olive oil in a dream indicates lawful livelihood, money and medicine for the fortuneteller. If one sees himself drinking olive oil then this It indicates magic or illness, and it is said that olive oil is a blessing, an inner light, and nourishment. The oil indicates the light of the heart and eyes and can indicate the recognition of children, and whoever sees that the oil is approaching him or binding him and the good oil becomes bad, this symbolizes breaking the covenant, but if The opposite. It happens and the bad oil becomes good, and this indicates good healing. Dreaming of olives in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interprets seeing olives in a dream as a blessed tree, symbolizing the knowledge, blessings and benefit of relatives, in addition to the blessing of the righteous. As for the one who sees that he is holding an olive leaf, This means that he is holding on to the most reliable handle. Seeing olives in a dream according to Ibn Ghannam. Ibn Ghannam interprets oil in a dream as an illness or sorcery that afflicts the dreamer, and the olive itself is pleasure, money, and sustenance, and the olive is a blessed man, as Al-Nabulsi interpreted it. And whoever sees himself squeezing olives from the tree will receive Goodness and blessings, and if he has a prisoner who survives, and it was said that seeing olives may sometimes disturb the insight. Olives in a dream are a sign of wellness for the patient, and the evidence for this is that one of the rich people saw in his dream the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, who advised him to take “. No, not if he wants good, and the interpretation of his vision is in the Almighty’s saying: Olives in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing an olive tree in a dream as a beneficial person for his family, and whoever sees that he owns an olive or eats it, he will face worry and sadness. The olive tree also indicates Women who carry and bear fruit and it can also refer to tables, servants, slaves, livestock, stores, and any places famous for food. Green olives in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating green olives with a piece of fresh bread, this indicates that he will enter into successful business projects that will bring him wealth.

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking about someone or asking about someone

preview.html: I LikeFansSubscribersFans Interpretation of seeing a dead person asking someone or asking about himAnyone Many interpret it as imminent death, but it carries within it many elements that we will quote from, including the announcement of imminent marriage, the pregnant woman’s announcement of the birth of a man, and other elements cited by translation experts. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for her clothes. Asking someone about his clothes and asking about them is an indication that the dreamer is suffering from epileptic seizures. A married woman who sees a dead person asks to wear leather because her husband loves her. The previous vision symbolizes a change in the married woman’s circumstances for the better for her and her husband. Interpretation of dreams for the dead who long to live In a dream, seeing a dead person in a dream, asking about a living person - is a sign of good news that will come to him soon. The dead person’s desire to live and his feeling of joy at seeing him indicates that he is calling him and offering sacrifices on his behalf. I mean, I see a question about the deceased person and he wants something from him based on his need, supplication, and charity. The previous vision expresses love for his care and knowledge of his circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for something. The dead asked for food in the dream showing the deceased’s need for charitable works. The deceased took money from the dreamer, which indicates his injury. The dead man asked for something from the dreamer and does not consider it a sign of his illness and that he will recover from it by the grace of God. Interpretation Dreaming of a dead person asking for clothes from a living person. A dead person asking for clothes from a living person is a sign that the dreamer is going through financial difficulties. A man who sees his dead son asking for clothes in a dream is a sign of relief after distress. The vision announces that the dreamer will get a lot of food. A pregnant woman who sees a dead person asking for clothes from a living person. He asks for clothes to give birth to him easily and give birth to a healthy fetus. I am looking for his dying clothes, a sign to put an end to the crises and problems that the dreamer is going through and to live happy moments. I give the dead. The pregnant woman’s clothes are a sign of her recovery from all diseases. Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the deceased feels happy is an indication of his good reputation in the future, and God I know. If the dreamer makes an important decision and sees a dead person smiling, this is a sign that he is referring to the right decision. Visiting the dead to the living is an indication that his anxiety has calmed down and the sadness he is experiencing has continued. Seeing a sick person in a dream is a dead man smiling at him and leaving him, indicating that he will recover soon, God willing. The death of a sick person in a dream indicates an increase in illness and death, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for cigarettes. A dead person asking for cigarettes in a dream indicates a rise in the prices of goods, including cigarettes. The deceased’s refusal to eat and asking for cigarettes is a sign of an assault on public opinion. Giving cigarettes to a dead man. The novelist is an indicator. On the abundance of goodness that returns to him. The previous vision also warns of a bad thing that will happen to the dreamer and he must be careful. Interpretation of seeing dead people wanting to take me with them. If a dead person asks about a living person, he wants to bear witness to him and pray over him. Seeing a dead person eating after his sight wants to take it as a sign of getting rid of the crises that She leads him. If the dead person insists on taking the fortune teller with him, this indicates his illness. The previous vision sees

title: Interpretation of wearing a gold chain for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of wearing a gold chain in a dream for a single girl: When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she has a gold chain. It indicates the tremendous success that this girl will achieve. That she will reach the highest levels and honors in the various stages of her life and be crowned with gold in the end. About a single girl who sees in Her dream is that she is wearing a beautiful, shiny gold chain. This indicates that livelihood and joy will come to her, whether that is in the marriage stage, in the work sector in general, or in her social life, and in forming successful and healthy friendships. Seeing herself wearing a gold chain or other valuable things In the dream of an unmarried girl, this means good luck in this world as she may also be appointed to a prestigious position and in that year she may reach the stage of marrying a very rich and high-ranking person. If the unmarried girl is in courtship and sees in her dream that she is burning a gold chain, this vision is hers. Two meanings, the first is that she is about to end her engagement soon, and the second is that if she is trying to find a job, she may miss a wonderful job opportunity that will never be repeated. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a dream about a gold chain for single womenInterpretation of seeing wearing a gold chain in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees In her dream, the gold chain in general. If this gold appears in a bright, precise, and attractive way, then it is one of the visions that herald good wealth, good luck, and a stable life for this woman, not only for herself, but for the rest of her family members. About a married woman who sees her husband wearing a gold chain for her in a dream, and feels... With great happiness, this vision is one of the visions that indicate the psychological state of health in which she lives that life in the marital nest and that she is confident that she has chosen to continue her life with the right person for her. As for seeing a married woman wearing a gold chain and seeing her in a dream with beautiful skin, it indicates the approaching period of pregnancy. For this woman, this vision also indicates that this woman feels her beauty and that she cares a lot about her beauty features to suit her husband and does not think about others. If a married woman dreams that her gold chain has rusted, this vision is evidence that she is suffering from many marital problems and disputes, and therefore there is fighting and discussion. There is an ongoing argument between her and her husband, which affects her psychologically and health-wise. Interpretation of seeing wearing a gold chain in a dream for a divorced woman When a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a gold necklace, this vision is a sign that this woman has already begun to take serious steps to marry a new man, but she did not tell anyone A member of her family with this important step in her life. As for seeing the silver chain in a divorced woman’s dream, she either wears this chain or sees it in general in her dream. It is a sign of her marriage to a good and pious man who treats her well and compensates her for the past and makes her forget all the sorrows and pains that she felt. Before her previous experience. To buy a gold chain in a divorced woman’s dream. It is one of the great signs that heralds good luck and good luck, and that this woman wishes

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the jinn in a married woman’s dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing a jinn in a dream for a married woman, and one of the things that raises fear and turmoil is for a married jinn to see her in her dreams, as they are unknown creatures that we do not know much about, but they are known to harm and hurt anyone who approaches their world. Staying away from it, all visual details have different interpretations, and this we will learn in the following lines. Seeing jeans in a dream for a married woman. Many jurists have mentioned that a dream about jinn may come from the dreamer’s growing thinking about these matters and his repeated reading of the other world and the wonders and things that happen in it beyond Imagination, especially if a person is strongly affected by what is happening. He hears or sees in movies and enters that world and gets close to it. These ideas are often reflected in his imagination in his vision of jinn and devils in his dream in many different forms. The dream of jinn can be repeated for a married woman, because it is a message for her to stop her shameful actions that push her into the circle of sins and transgressions, and it is difficult for her to retreat or repent, because this He must stop doing this before it is too late, especially since he may have many skills and characteristics that must be used to their advantage and do what is useful and good. The more the dreamer perseveres in front of the elves in the dream and feels confident and steadfast, the more her strong personality appears in reality and her correct thinking with many decisions And the fateful choices in her life, in addition to her superior ability to overcome difficulties and crises. . It was the result of conspiracies hatched against her by the enemies and haters surrounding her, and God knows best. Seeing the jinn in a dream for Ibn Shirin’s married wife. Ibn Sirin relied in his interpretations on what is seen in a dream for symbols and signs that have a great influence in changing the interpretations and meanings associated with the dream, as the appearance of the good jinn that does not Intending to harm or harm is one of the indications of the guidance of insight, and his intense desire to stay away from desires, pleasures and directives, and to repent and do good deeds, or corrupted by the jinn who appears to be evil and immoral, is one of the signs of many sins and disobedience in it. Life and her constant preoccupation with worldly matters. He pointed out that a married woman’s dreams and repressed desires related to traveling and traveling around the world in order to acquire new skills and cultures are among the main factors in seeing jeans in her dreams. Life and conspiracies for her until she loses her comfort and fills her life with worries and strife. Seeing jeans in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman may want to see jeans in her dream as a result of what she really feels of fear and extreme anxiety about the circumstances of pregnancy and childbirth, and the pain and problems that she may be exposed to that day. The fetus, and thus these obsessions and disturbances appear in the frequent sighting of jinn and goblins, and the nightmares may become severe, and she will be unable to sleep normally, and lose much of her comfort, God forbid. Seeing the jinn attacking her is a sign that she is surrounded by many problems and crises that may be represented by a serious illness. It may lead to the loss of the fetus or she suffers from conflicts with her husband

title: Interpretation of a dream: Entering the mosque without praying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about entering the mosque without praying in a dream In case you are looking for an interpretation of the dream of entering the mosque without praying in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very uncomfortable, but he wants you to know an explanation for that. We will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, and they are the interpretations of some diligent scholars, not managers. The website does not interfere in the interpretations, rather they convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of the dream: Entering the mosque without praying in a dream. Entering the mosque in a dream may indicate a feeling of safety during this time. Whoever sees in his dream that he is entering the mosque, it may indicate his closeness to God, Blessed and Most High. A dream may indicate A person turning his house into a mosque in a dream means a high status that the dreamer will achieve during this period. And whoever sees in a dream that he arrived at the mosque and found it closed, this may indicate getting rid of the debts that he suffered in the previous period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about entering a cinema in a dream indicates a vision of entering a cinema In a dream, watching a movie indicates the changes occurring in the dreamer’s life at that time. Whoever sees in his dream that he entered the cinema may indicate that there is a transitional phase in the life of the visionary during those days. Seeing someone entering the cinema in a dream may indicate the ambition of the visionary to reach To his dreams and aspirations. If a person sees that he entered the cinema in a dream, this may indicate good changes in his life during this period, and God knows best. In the case of my personal opinion that a lizard is inside the house in a dream, this may indicate many problems and concerns in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a lizard wandering around the house may indicate bad luck that the dreamer faces during those days. Seeing a lizard entering the house may indicate Some of the problems and conflicts that family members were suffering from at that time, and God knows best. A dream may indicate that there is someone underground In a dream, it indicates some difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Whoever sees in his dream that he went underground may indicate some difficulties that he regrets in his life during those days, and God knows best. If a person sees that he went underground in a dream, this may indicate To the conflicts that occurred to him in his life during this period, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking milk by Ibn Sirin: A dream about drinking milk

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drinking milk for a single womanDrinking milk in a dream for a pregnant womanBuying milk in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about drinking milk from the breastMilk in a dream from the breastInterpretation of a dream about drinking milk for a girlInterpretation of a dream about supplying milkDistributing milk in a dreamDrinking milk in a dream indicates an abundant harvest for the farmer, joys at home, and a successful trip for the traveler. As for women, this dream is a good omen. Seeing large amounts of milk in a dream means prestige and wealth. As for the dream that you are engaged in the milk trade, its interpretation is an increase in your wealth, and if you dream that you are distributing milk for free to others, this means that you will improve and pay zakat for your good. . Wealth.But if you dream of dirty milk, it means that you will have small problems, and if the milk in the dream is sour, it means that you are worried and worried about the problems of friends, and if in the dream you are trying in vain to drink milk, it means that you are in danger of losing something valuable or you will lose Friendship with a high-ranking person, and if you dream of warm milk, this means that you will enter into a conflict at the end of which your desires and ambitions will be fulfilled. As for bathing in milk, it represents the pleasures and company of good friends, and if a woman sees that she does not have milk, beware that she is breastfeeding a well-known man or woman. The doors of the world are closed in her face and in theirs, and it was said that whoever sees her is as if she is a woman earning money and taking care of herself. The opinion of interpretation scholars: Whoever dreams that he drinks the milk of a mare or a horse, the Sultan loves him and receives him well. Interpretation of a dream about drinking milk by Al-Nabulsi: Whoever sees that he drank the milk of a mare, the Sultan loves him and receives him well. And whoever drinks Ramaka’s milk will meet a king. Interpretation of dreams for a dream about drinking milk by Ibn Shaheen: Whoever dreams of drinking milk from his chest and then betrays his income and livelihood. Interpretation of drinking milk in a dream Waseem Youssef - YouTube

title: Interpretation of water in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of water in a dream by Ibn Sirin and other scholars: Water in general indicates the abundance of goodness and abundance of livelihood. God Almighty says: “And We created from water all things, so will they not believe?” On the interpretation of water in a dream and its various connotations, according to the opinion of preachers, so follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of water in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If a person sees a lot of water in a dream, this indicates a state of prosperity that befalls him or society, God willing. And if he sees that he drinks a lot of water, then this It indicates longevity in his life. And if he sees that he is irrigating one of them, this indicates that the dreamer will give birth to a boy. And if he sees that he is drinking turbid water, this indicates the suffering that he is suffering from. If he sees that he is drinking black water, this indicates blindness. If the water is Yellow, this indicates illness. If the water smells bad, this means illegal profits. And if he sees that he is walking on water, this indicates that he will achieve what he wants, or acquire knowledge that will benefit him. And if he sees that water runs between houses and trees and overcomes them, he announces A calamity descends on the country. And if he sees water flowing from the stairs of the house, it indicates that one of the members of the household has passed to the mercy of God Almighty. And if he drinks Zamzam water, this indicates the abundance of goodness and blessings in the diet. And if he is seen distributing Zamzam water, it indicates his kindness to his parents in a way that pleases them. Dirty water in a dream. Dirty water in a dream may indicate sadness that befalls the dreamer. It may also indicate that he may enter into a forbidden project or may contaminate forbidden funds. Seeing running water for individuals. Running water means gathering and fertility of the land, and, God willing, the marriage of single people, which is good. For her life and well-being. Interpretation of water coming out of the ground in a dream: The dream indicates that water is coming out of the ground for a lot of goodness, and an abundance of food, God willing, unless the water overflows into the houses and enters them as a flood, then sadness descends on the ground. And if he sees that the water is flowing smoothly toward His house, this is a good sign that God will guide him. And if he sees water flowing from the floor of his house, it shows a calamity that will befall him, and if it comes out of the wall, it shows the anxiety of relatives. Interpretation of water spraying in a dream for a man, a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. If he sees water being poured on him, he will comfort him and feed him. And if he sees that he is spraying his children, he shows his love for them. If an unmarried woman sees that someone is spraying her with water, this indicates that he wants to get close to her, that he wants to marry her, and that he will enjoy life with her, God willing, and shows her endless provision. And if she sees that the one who sprayed her is a woman, it shows that she has been liberated from the worry and distress in which she lives, God knows best. If a married woman sees her husband sprinkling her with water and he is able to do so, this indicates that he is helping her in her troubles, and if she sees him sprinkling water, it indicates Her patience is according to God’s will. If a pregnant woman sees that water is poured on her, this indicates the love of those around her for her, and if she sees that she is bathing in plenty of water, this indicates the ease of her birth. This was our discussion about the interpretation of water in a dream. Follow us on the encyclopedia to get...

If a pregnant woman sees that water is poured on her, this indicates the love of those around her for her, and if she sees that she is bathing in plenty of water, this indicates the ease of her birth. This was our discussion about the interpretation of water in a dream. Follow us on the encyclopedia to get...

title: Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream for good and evil

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream for good and evil. It is worth noting that there is a large group of sources related to the science of dream interpretation, the most important of which is found in the collection of books published by scholars in this field, in addition to identifying different opinions through websites on the Internet. Which shows how easy it is to access the required information, taking into account the extent of trust in the source from which the information was obtained, and this explains why many people resort to knowing the interpretation of their dreams through the most famous scholars of this science such as Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream According to Ibn Sirin, the scholar Ibn Sirin says: Leprosy in a dream refers to the jinn or Satan, as it is the only animal that was blown into the fire in which our master Abraham, peace be upon him, is in it, and it is also difficult to see it. This is because of its speed and agility, and it requires hard effort to kill it and get rid of it, so seeing it in a dream is never a good thing. The waste of slaughtered animals in a dream symbolizes the corrupt and immoral person who seeks to spread discord among people and ignite the fire of discord among them. It also symbolizes enemies of religion and Islam or a criminal. The killer who spreads corruption in the country. Also, the stomach in a dream may indicate the presence of someone who stirs up problems and worries between a man and his wife, causing them to fall between them. Whoever sees deception in his dream, then he is dealing with a person of bad morals and lack of virtue, and he seeks to mislead him and keep him away from the path of truth. Seeing a gecko in a dream means that a man is shirking responsibility for his family and home and that he is not taking care of them and treating them well in word or deed. Whoever sees in his dream that a gecko is spitting its poison into his food, then his dream indicates that he is earning his livelihood through illegal means. Interpretation Seeing Al-Barisi in a dream: Interpretation of seeing Al-Barisi in a dream according to Imam Muhammad bin Sirin. Bressi, gecko, gecko, or gecko, is known as one of the species of colorful, fast-moving reptiles, which color according to the environment in which they live in order to hide from people's eyes. It is one of the reptiles that causes feelings of fear and anxiety when seen on the ground. Ibn Sirin indicated in his interpretation of seeing Al-Barisi in a dream that because of the legality of its movement and light weight, it may symbolize the jinn in a dream, as it is one of the hated animals and was the only one. That he threw fire on the Prophet of God, Abraham, peace be upon him. Since all types of geckos are poisonous and we cannot kill them easily, but rather require intense time and effort due to their extreme speed, seeing them in a dream may symbolize envy or magic, and God knows best. Seeing them often symbolizes immorality. And corruption in the morals of the dreamer and his circumstances in this world. Seeing a gecko in a dream indicates sinners who fight God’s religion on earth, or a married adulterer, as both must be killed, as the Holy Prophet ordered us to kill a gecko. The entrails often symbolize the presence of an immoral man seeking To sow discord among people and work to divide them, based on the words of Almighty God: “After Satan quarreled between me and my brothers.” Often

title: Seeing Abdel Halim Hafez in a dream

preview.html: The dark nightingale Abdul Halim Hafez in a dream is interpreted in different ways according to his compound name, as well as his title and attribute. As for the name Halim, it indicates one whose kindness extends, so forgive him. The name Hafez means: one who preserves the matters entrusted to him, the protector, the guardian. He is called the memorizer of the Holy Qur’an. It is not permissible for us to define him, because “Hafiz” is God Almighty. The vision of the artist Abdel Halim is also explained by his nickname (The Nightingale) and the nightingale: a small bird, fast moving, many melodies, that lives in the orchards, and appears in the days of spring, and the nightingale that sings It sets an example for him. Navigation and kindness.Seeing Abdel Halim Hafez in a dream is also interpreted by his fame, popularity, and favor among people. There is no artist in the Arab world, but the whole world saw love like a nightingale. Generations have agreed on this, and the Nightingale is still beloved by the public, even though more than four decades have passed since his death. Through these positive meanings that we find in the name of Abdel Halim Hafez, as well as his title and description, we cannot help but consider it a positive symbol in a dream, According to several ideas that we will reveal one by one.Interpretation of seeing Abdel Halim Hafez in a single woman’s dream. Seeing Abdel Halim Hafez in a dream of an unmarried woman is a good vision, especially if she sees a girl in her dream. Abdel Halim Hafez shakes her hand, kisses her, embraces her, and walks with her. On the street, accompanying her in. car. Or seeing that he is addressing him. Most of the meanings associated with this vision are related to feelings or emotions, which means that if the girl sees Abdel Halim in a romantic atmosphere, she may witness an emotional state that mimics what she saw in the dream. Read also: Handshake in a dream Some contemporary interpreters rely on Abdel Halim’s songs In dream interpretation, they think of hearing a song full of sadness and sorrow, which may indicate a deep sadness in the soul of an unmarried woman. Hearing a happy song means good news. As for the patriotic songs of the brown nightingale, they are signs or indicators of success in a dream. Chants or spiritual supplications are an expression of transcendence, transcendence, and overcoming adversity due to its purity and purity. Read also: Singing in a dream Seeing Abdel Halim Hafez in a dream for an unmarried woman is very praiseworthy when she sees him in a beautiful white dress and promises the best. Sweet or gift? Whoever sees this as an unmarried woman, with the help of God Almighty, she will be given good tidings of what she wants or hopes will happen. But if the girl is a pupil or student and she sees in a dream that the artist Abdel Halim gives her a key, then this is the interpretation of her success. Read also: The name of Hafez in a dream, and whoever saw a picture One for Abdel Halim in her dream, which the Creator will preserve and dream of. As for Abdel Halim Hafez’s smile in a dream, it is an expression of contentment, acceptance, and tolerance among people. If an unmarried woman sees this, she will enjoy human love, and whoever sees that Abdel Halim Hafez gives her a ring, a ring, or a ring, he will get married. The meaning of seeing Abdel Halim Hafez in a dream for a married woman. Abdel Halim Hafez in a dream of a married woman shows the solution.
